name: Restoration Hardware Pierpont Barware Collection
description: Bar set from the company Restoration Hardware. A collection of Pierpont. A distinctive feature of the collection is beveled edges reason the majority of subjects. Handmade. The set includes: - Glass for shots (SHOT GLASS) - a bowl for serving caviar (CAVIAR SERVER) - A glass of whiskey (DOUBLE OLD-FASHIONED) - A glass of whiskey and soda (HIGHBALL) - Decanter for Whisky narrow (TALL DECANTER) - The decanter of vodka for a (SHORT DECANTER) - Pails for ice (iCE BUCKET) caviar, ice, a slice of grapefruit spoon Show more
